description: This Kotlin source file implements a RecyclerView Adapter (MenuItemAdapter) for displaying menu items in an Android food delivery app. It manages item views, handles user interactions like adding items, adjusting quantities, and toggling favorites, using diffing for efficient updates.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying menu items, with support for adding items, quantity adjustments, and favorites toggling, using diff callbacks for efficient updates.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for MenuItemAdapter, holding references to item view components.

methods.name: areItemsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if two MenuItem objects are the same based on their IDs.

methods.name: areContentsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if the contents of two MenuItem objects are the same.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder and sets up click listeners for user interactions.
